title: Cabrillo National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons        The Old Point Loma Lighthouse has been welcoming visitors since 1855. NPS Photo      WE'RE OPEN EVERY DAY OF THE YEAR EXCEPT FOR THANKSGIVING AND CHRISTMAS. Cabrillo National Monument is open from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM - except on Thanksgiving and Christmas. Please note the following facility closing times:       FEATURE OR FACILITY        CLOSING TIME          Assistant Keepers Quarters Exhibit   5:00 PM     Bayside Trail   4:00 PM     Bookstore   5:00 PM     Cabrillo and the Age of Exploration Exhibit   5:00 PM     Lighthouse    5:00 PM     Military History Exhibit   5:00 PM     Tidepools   4:30 PM     Entrance Station   5:00 PM     Visitor Center   5:00 PM            5:00 PM Park Closure     Please note:  The main gate into Cabrillo National Monument closes at 5:00 PM, and all visitors must exit the park at 5:00 PM. Public access after 5pm and before 9am is not allowed. This includes walking, jogging, biking or any type of entry is not allowed.   Thank you for your understanding. If you have any questions, please feel free to email us.
